FuncDef:
The ftp timeout command sets the idle timeout interval of the client.
The undo ftp timeout command restores the idle timeout interval to its default value.
By default, the timeout value is 10 minutes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the timeout interval in minutes.
Timeout interval is an integer data type. The value range is from 1 to 35791 minutes.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The timeout interval is set to disconnect the services provided by the FTP server to the client, which is idle for the specified time.
The command ftp timeoutonly takes effect for ipv4 connection.
